name: Hot Chocolate Harmony
description:
Move with WASD or arrow keys; use mouse to click "Continue"!

***

Can you match pitch? Do you like music theory? Do you like pixel art???

If you answered yes to any of those questions, Hot Chocolate Harmony is the game for you! This is a 2D puzzle game where you drag and drop ~musical items~ to match pitch, or make the same musical sounds that the main character YIRAN is singing.

The game is complete, but there are surely bugs and we will surely release updates! 

Created by Yuwei Lin (https://yuweilin.org/portfolio/more/) and me (KB)

<3

***

There is a Windows and a Mac version of the game currently, but there are often problems opening the game file on Mac -- please comment if you have issues and I'll  be sure to help!
